CSSMathMin.summary: The CSSMathMin interface of the CSS Typed Object Model API represents the CSS {{CSSXref('min','min()')}} function. It inherits properties and methods from its parent .

CSSMathMinCSSMathMin.summary:
NOTE Experimental The CSSMathMin() constructor creates a
new object which represents the CSS
'min' function.

CSSMathMinValues.summary:
The CSSMathMin.values read-only property of the
interface returns a object
which contains one or more objects.
